Bitcoin Wallets for iOS

Mycelium Learn More

Mycelium, founded in 2008, is a Bitcoin company with 35 employees located in Europe, Asia, and America. Mycelium offers mobile wallets for iPhone and Android. All of Mycelium’s applications are open source. Mycelium is a good option for new users, with basic features like watch-only addresses, cold storage spending, and HD accounts. Advanced options include TREZOR support, xpub/xpriv key exports, and decrypting BIP38 keys. Mycelium can also be used to restore a TREZOR seed.

Learn More

Blockchain.info Learn More

Blockchain.info is the world’s most popular blockchain explorer, and also offers a simple Bitcoin web wallet. Blockchain.info wallets can be accessed from in any web browser, apps for iPhone and Android, and browser extensions for Firefox and Chrome.

Learn More
